title: Office of Government Information Services: Who We Are and How We Can Help You Through the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) Process
description: The Office of Government Information Services (OGIS) is a neutral party that helps resolve disputes between FOIA requesters and agencies and reviews agency FOIA compliance. OGIS acts as the Federal Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) Ombudsman and educates FOIA requesters and Federal agencies, resolves disputes, and assesses compliance.
